name: WP AJAX Login and Register Popup
author: Hasibul Islam Badsha

sections.description:
WP AJAX Login and Register Popup is a WordPress plugin to login and register on your website using popup box! Use this shortcode [WPALRP-LOGIN] in the widget where you want to display login/register button.

Official Documentation: https://www.e2softsolution.com/wp-ajax-login-and-register-popup/

  • Live Demo
  • Need Help?
  • About Author

Video Tutorial

You can select/change

  • Font Size.
  • Font Color.
  • Button Background Color.
  • Button Font Size.
  • Button Font Color.

Usage

  1. Go to your Dashboard after installation and navigate to “Settings >> AJAX Login Settings” to configure the Login/Register.
  2. Go to Widget after installation and drop “AJAX Login or Register” to your desired area, where you want to display AJAX Login or Register button.
  3. Add extra ID “show_login” at login menu & ID “show_signup” at register menu.

Features

  • Very easy installation
  • Widget system
  • Unlimited color variation by using jQuery color picker.
  • Responsive design
  • Flexible and easy to use
  • Lightweight JQuery
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-ajax-login-register-popup to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Just copy and paste if(function_exists(‘wpalrp_popup_functions’)){ wpalrp_get_data_from_settings(); } in template code or [WPALRP-LOGIN] in the post/page where you want to display login/register button.
sections.faq:
Can it possible to use throw shordcode?

Yes.

Could it possible to places this plugin on post or page?

Yes.

Could it possible to places this plugin on widget?

Yes.

Could it possible to places this plugin on menu?

Yes.
